self_predictions.prediction_summary: I think it will be a good match but I will win. I'm confident and in good shape with no injuries.
self_predictions.physical_condition_self: no pain in the arm, in good shape
self_predictions.training_status_self: training side pressure with Sasho and Krasi

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Dave is very powerful and can stop Vitaly if he goes in the strap. Vitaly has no chance if Dave is smarter.

Dave Chaffee.strength: Very powerful inside, side pressure. One of the strongest when not injured.
Dave Chaffee.health: No injuries reported, in much better shape than before.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Destroyed Vitaly in the strap but lost without it. Beat Alex Kurdecha.

Vitaly Laletin.strength: Good grip and fast start but struggles against good top-rollers.
Vitaly Laletin.previous_match_summary: Lost to Dave in the strap but beat him without it.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon is very smart, clever, and way more powerful than Vitaly. He will not allow Vitaly to beat him on the grip.

Devon Larratt.strength: Very smart, clever, and powerful. Excellent table IQ.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Showed great endurance and control in recent matches.

Vitaly Laletin.strength: Dangerous with tall, long arm and good grip.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Janis is one of the smartest guys on the table with better technique. Mindaugas is strong but will lose this match.

Janis Amolins.strength: Smart, excellent technique, and very dangerous.

Mindaugas Tarasaitis.strength: Strong but lacks technique compared to Janis.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Craig is pretty strong with good experience on the table. He will win.
Sarah will win and be very well prepared. She lost last year and wants revenge.

Sarah Bäckman.health: Lighter but didn't lose any power or muscle.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Matt will top-roll Ongarbaev and be uncomfortable for him. Ongarbaev is coming back from surgery.

Matt Mask.strength: Explosive, crazy on the table, and very powerful.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Either it goes fast by Kody to the pin pad or it will be a war.
Devon is way bigger now and Corey is not powerful enough to pull without wrist. Devon will win.

Devon Larratt.strength: Very difficult to beat, growing bigger.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Controlled all the match against Gennady.

Corey West.strength: Not powerful enough to pull without wrist.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John will stop Kanai, top-roll him, and slowly climb. He has better hand control and knows how to beat Kanai.

John Brzenk.strength: Better hand control, knows Kanai well.
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: Finished Kanai with shoulder pressure in the past.

Yoshinobu Kanai.previous_match_summary: Lost to John in the past.
